name: Cubes (itch) (meircif)
description:
Two armies with cannons mounted on cubes with one goal: destroy all enemy cannons!

Play in the browser or downloaded with the links in the bottom.

Controls
  • Select cannon with mouse left button
  • Aim with keyboard arrows
  • Shoot: press and hold Space to build power, release to shoot
  • Move view with WASD keys
  • Zoom view with mouse wheel
  • Rotate view by moving mouse while pressing the right button
Version 1.2.2

This is the first published version of the game. I will add new features based on popular requests.

Cubes can be downloaded and played on any personal computer or played directly from the browser.

Major features added since last version
  • Challenging AI - with 3 levels of difficulty
  • Better level organization - 30 base levels and "infinite" extra levels
  • Manual game - allowing to play any kind of game without limitations
  • Many small bug fixes
  • Tutorial
